summary.title: minimum-mission-application
summary.description:
The system is a heterogeneous vehicle system used for ocean operations. 
The minimum application includes a command and control application, neptus, which is running on a pc onshore or from a boat.
The receiver of this message is the LAUV, running the onboard application DUNE. 
The Manta is acting as a gateway and forwarding messages from neptus to DUNE.
Neptus as well as manta and the LAUV can communicate over Wifi.
Manta and the LAUV can also communicate over acoustic channels.
The LAUV only supports UDP.
